ippusbd(8) System Manager's Manual ippusbd(8)

NAME

ippusbd —
ipp to usb bridging daemon.

SYNOPSIS

NONE (launched by launchd)

DESCRIPTION

ippusbd bridges connections from a TCP/IP socket to a USB printer.

This command is not intended to be invoked directly.

FILES

/usr/sbin/ippusbd
 

SEE ALSO

launchd(8)

HISTORY

The ippusbd daemon first appeared in Mac OS 10.8.
January 27, 2012 Mac OS X
